title: When is the changes to the runes going to happen?
body: I got told that there was going to be changes to the runes a while back. Is this still happening?

replies.body: In November. Seriously, you couldn't just do a search to find info on the system?
yes , after the 7.18 patch ( aka after worlds )

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WaMm9lJn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-02T14:16:43.304+0000)
>
> yes , after the 7.18 patch ( aka after worlds )

guess it will be 7.23 again
